de.tif.jacob.scheduler.iterators
Class RestrictedDailyIterator

java.lang.Object
  de.tif.jacob.scheduler.iterators.RestrictedDailyIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScheduleIterator
public class RestrictedDailyIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScheduleIterator

A RestrictedDailyIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days (restricted to a set of days, e.g. weekdays only) representing the same time each day.
